title: ICE returning an unknown type with impl FnMut

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
```
fn generate_duration() -> Oper<impl FnMut()> {
        
}
```

I expected just a compiler error `cannot find type Oper`. Compiler panicked:
